net.lapismc.lapischat.framework

Class ChatPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer

  • public class ChatPlayer
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatPlayer(UUID uuid) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChannel(Channel channel)
      Adds a player to a channel, this means the player will receive messages from this channel This may involve entering a password, if you wish to add a player regardless of protections use forceAddChannel(Channel)
      void banFromChannel(Channel channel)
      This will remove the player from the channel and stop them from joining until they are unbanned
      void forceAddChannel(Channel channel)
      Forces a player into a channel, this overrides things like channel passwords
      List<Channel> getChannels() 
      Channel getMainChannel() 
      org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer getOfflinePlayer() 
      org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayer() 
      boolean isBannedFromChannel(Channel channel) 
      boolean isInChannel(Channel channel) 
      void removeChannel(Channel channel)
      Removing a player form a channel means they will no longer receive any messages sent in that channel MainChannel will be set to null if the channel you are removing is currently the main channel
      void savePlayerData()
      Saves the players channel data to their configuration file This includes the channels they are in, the channel they are chatting in and any banned channels
      void sendMessage(String msg)
      Send the string as a message to the player This is used by channels when they are sending messages This method will not format the message, it just sends it to the player
      void setMainChannel(Channel mainChannel)
      Sets the channel the player will send messages to
      void unBanFromChannel(Channel channel)
      Un-bans a player from the channel, this will allow them to join the channel again

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getMainChannel

        public Channel getMainChannel()
        Returns:
        Returns the Channel that the player is currently sending messages to

      • setMainChannel

        public void setMainChannel(Channel mainChannel)
        Sets the channel the player will send messages to
        Parameters:
        mainChannel - The channel you wish to have the player use

      • addChannel

        public void addChannel(Channel channel)
        Adds a player to a channel, this means the player will receive messages from this channel This may involve entering a password, if you wish to add a player regardless of protections use forceAddChannel(Channel)
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to add

      • forceAddChannel

        public void forceAddChannel(Channel channel)
        Forces a player into a channel, this overrides things like channel passwords
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to add

      • removeChannel

        public void removeChannel(Channel channel)
        Removing a player form a channel means they will no longer receive any messages sent in that channel MainChannel will be set to null if the channel you are removing is currently the main channel
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you want the player to be removed from

      • banFromChannel

        public void banFromChannel(Channel channel)
        This will remove the player from the channel and stop them from joining until they are unbanned
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to ban this player from joining

      • isBannedFromChannel

        public boolean isBannedFromChannel(Channel channel)
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the player is currently banned from joining this channel

      • unBanFromChannel

        public void unBanFromChannel(Channel channel)
        Un-bans a player from the channel, this will allow them to join the channel again
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to unban the player from

      • getChannels

        public List<Channel> getChannels()
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Channel's that the player is in

      • isInChannel

        public boolean isInChannel(Channel channel)
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel you wish to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the player is in the channel provided

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String msg)
        Send the string as a message to the player This is used by channels when they are sending messages This method will not format the message, it just sends it to the player
        Parameters:
        msg - The string to be sent to the player

      • savePlayerData

        public void savePlayerData()
        Saves the players channel data to their configuration file This includes the channels they are in, the channel they are chatting in and any banned channels
